name: Python Development Mastery
description: Master Python development from fundamentals to advanced topics: web frameworks (Django, FastAPI), data science (Pandas, NumPy), testing (pytest), async programming, packaging, and performance optimization
author: Python Learning Team

agents.name: Python Fundamentals Agent
agents.description: Master Python syntax, data types, control flow, functions, OOP, and standard library with hands-on projects

agents.name: Python Web Development Agent
agents.description: Build production-ready web applications with Django, Flask, and FastAPI frameworks

agents.name: Python Data Science Agent
agents.description: Master data analysis and machine learning with Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and visualization tools

agents.name: Python Testing & Quality Agent
agents.description: Implement comprehensive testing with pytest, unittest, and quality assurance practices

agents.name: Python Async & Concurrency Agent
agents.description: Master asynchronous programming with asyncio, concurrent operations, and parallel processing

agents.name: Python Packaging & Deployment Agent
agents.description: Package and deploy Python applications with Poetry, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines

agents.name: Python Best Practices Agent
agents.description: Learn Python coding standards, design patterns, performance optimization, and professional development practices

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Choose your learning roadmap and get personalized guidance

commands.name: agent-guide
commands.description: Get specialized guidance from domain expert agents

commands.name: skill-assessment
commands.description: Assess your knowledge and get recommendations

commands.name: project-builder
commands.description: Explore hands-on projects and build your portfolio
